description: Alternations to the rear and side windows/doors; re-roofing of the rear outrigger; alternations to front of property involving soft landscaping and installation of fences and driveway gate (part retrospective).
decision_conditions: Any alterations to the existing development hereby permitted shall be carried out within six (6) months of the date of this permission, otherwise the planning permission will lapse.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the application documents: 16NA-PL-00 Rev.A, 16NA-PL-01 Rev.D,16NA-PL-02 Rev.A,16NA-PL-03 Rev.A, 16NA-PL-04 Rev.B, 16NA-PL-05 Rev.A.
Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Any planting that is part of the approved scheme shall be planted in semi-mature or mature status and that within a period of five years after planting is removed, dies or becomes seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season and all planting shall be replaced with others of a similar size and species and in the same position, unless the Local Planning Authority first gives written consent to any variation.

Reason: To improve the visual amenity of the property through urban greening and in the interests of providing a sustainable environment for future occupiers of the development in accordance with policies 1.1 (f) (g) of the Development Strategy 2026 (2012); policies D3, D4, D8, G3, G5 and G7 of the London Plan (2021), policies 5.10, 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
